full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Olympic Style Judo Tatami Mats

**Procurement ID:** #M5000-23-05710/A

**Tender Number:** cb-5316-45795400

**Amendment Number:** #2

**Contracting Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

**Procurement Status:** Closed

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a supplier to provide a minimum of 620 Olympic style judo tatami mats. The contract is expected to be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest evaluated price. The procurement process is governed by the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Specifications:**

* The supplier must provide 620 Olympic style judo tatami mats with the option to purchase additional mats up to a maximum of 100.
* The specifications for the mats are outlined in Annex “A” of the tender documents.

**Tender Requirements:**

* The bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
* The supplier must submit their bid electronically to the RCMP’s Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Officer: Lianne Hopkie, RCMP Procurement and Contracting Services, Regina, SK
* Phone: 639-625-3630
* Email: lianne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**

* The procurement process is governed by the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* The tender documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* The RCMP retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Saskatchewan

**Regions of Delivery:**
Canada

Note that the tender process has ended as the tender closing date has passed. We hope this rewritten entry meets your needs! Let us know if there's anything else we can help you with.  We will make sure to proof
